title: Bug 10758utilize classpath variable initializers
description: Bug 10758utilize classpath variable initializers From JCORE: "the CLASSPATH VARIABLE INITIALIZE should be leveraged by theorgg.eclipse.jdt.launching plugin to initialize JRELIB, JRESRC etc. "CLASSPATH VARIABLE INITIALIZER==============================Added extension point to jdtcore so as to allow client plugins to registerclasspath variable initializers. Extension point is"org.eclipse.jdt.core.classpathVariableInitializer").
OB: (also checkdevelopment resources for design notes on this topic) Note that eachclasspath variable, if unbound, will trigger its registered initializerexactly once per session. If unsuccessful, it will stay unbound.
